name: Glowy Super Gel Lightweight Dewy Multipurpose Illuminator
about: What it is: This lightweight, non-comedogenic illuminator is your forever first step under makeup for a hydrated, glowy radiance...Finish:\ Radiant..Formulation:\ Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Plant-Derived Glycerin: Powerful humectant known to increase skin’s natural moisture level..- Olive-Derived Squalane: Locks in moisture and leaves skin quenched and visibly glowing..- Rosehip Seed Oil: Ultra-rich in antioxidants to visibly brighten and moisturize skin...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This award-winning versatile illuminator is available in four universal sheer shades that instantly give a glitter-free glow. Its unique gel texture melts into skin and can also be worn alone, mixed into skincare and makeup, or wherever you want skin that glows from within...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency....This product is an Allure\ Best of Beauty award winner.
ingredients: - Plant-Derived Glycerin: Powerful humectant known to increase skin’s natural moisture level..- Olive-Derived Squalane: Locks in moisture and leaves skin quenched and visibly glowing..- Rosehip Seed Oil: Ultra-rich in antioxidants to visibly brighten and moisturize skin....STARGLOW:.Water / Aqua / Eau, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Glycerin, Mica, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Squalane, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 60, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Lactic Acid, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491)....SUNGLOW:.Water / Aqua / Eau, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Glycerin, Mica, Sodium Acrylate/sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Isohexadecane, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 80, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Sorbitan Oleate, Lactic Acid, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499)....ROSEGLOW: .Aqua /Water / Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Glycerin, Mica, Squalane, Carica Papaya Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Isostearate, Phenethyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate, Lactic Acid.  [+/- May Contain/Peut Contenir:  Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxide (Ci 77491)].The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Think of Glowy Super Gel\ as your forever first step for an effortless glow:.- Apply 1-2 pumps all over under your favorite foundation, tinted moisturizer, or other complexion products. Use fingertips or The Big Brush to blend in.. .Glowy Super Gel\ is also a multipurpose illuminator:  .- Stacked on top of any look as a spot highlighter for instant glass-skin..- Mixed into cream makeup or skincare formula to boost glow..- Worn alone on the face or body (like your chest, collarbones, shoulders, and legs) for an all-over-glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: This product USED TO BE amazing! It was grippy (primer like) and highly pigmented. It would help my makeup stay on for HOURS and with an out of the world glow. Sadly, now it’s just watery with barely any color. Please bring back the old formula!!!! I’m convinced the people making it viral have the old formula. If you don’t understand what the rave is all about or if it isn’t working for you… I think you may have gotten the new formula and I’m sorry you don’t get to try the original to see how amazing this was. Again, BRING BACK THE OLD FORMULA!

reviews.review_title: Warmed Up and Healthy Looking Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first heard about Warmglow I was worried that it would be too warm and too golden for me because I am extremely fair with neutral undertones.  As soon as I applied onto my skin I changed my mind and realized I was wrong! Don’t judge the product by the color in the bottle or the small icon that it shows on the website.  I like how lightweight and gel-like it feels. It doesn’t feel like I’m caking on layers of makeup on top of it. I like that I can use it in so many ways and change up how I apply it. I like to apply onto my skin on really good skin days and it gives me more lively and healthy looking. I also will apply as a primer with makeup over or by mixing in with my foundation. I actually wanted to apply more product than I thought I would because it’s so light weight and I wanted it more of the warmglow to shine through my skin.  Don’t be discouraged without trying it yourself! You will be surprised!

As someone with oily skin I usually avoid all over highlighters but this one is subtle but build able for when you want more. And it's not glittery or metallic! The bottle is big and will last a very long time. Can't wait to try it on my body when the weather is warmer

reviews.review_title: A must if you want “glow but make it look natural”
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re chasing that “glow but make it look natural” vibe, the Super Glowy Gel in Warm Glow is where it’s at. The formula is a lightweight gel-meets-serum hybrid that feels hydrating without being sticky or heavy. It glides onto the skin effortlessly and leaves behind this sheer, soft-focus finish that diffuses imperfections while boosting radiance.  The consistency is super smooth—almost watery—so it layers beautifully whether you wear it on bare skin, as a luminous base under makeup, or mixed with foundation. Warm Glow is the perfect golden tone, adding warmth without veering into orangey or glittery territory.  Honestly, it’s the kind of product that works for any makeup vibe—from full glam to barely-there. Bonus: it’s clean, cruelty-free, and never clogs pores. A total staple for that fresh, dewy glow.

reviews.review_text: Warmglow is on the right and sunglow (for comparison) is on the left in the pictures! Warmglow is absolutely perfect for my skin tone. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product for natural makeup! You can put it all over your face or just certain parts of your face like typical highlighter.  For reference I have light-medium skin.

I already love the lightweight gel formula of the Glowy Super Gel, and the new Warmglow shade has made me fall in love with it even more. This shade is incredibly flattering and looks so natural on my complexion. It adds a gorgeous, soft glow to my face. The application is effortless—I simply use my fingers to blend it. I like to apply it on my cheekbones and down the center of my nose for a radiant, lit-from-within look!

I love glowy gel, but this shade is definitely my favorite. I have fair-light skin and it is such a perfect and natural shade for me. It the color matches me very well, so the glow it gives leaves my skin looking very natural and glowy. I also love how versatile this product is. I mix it with my foundation and face cream, use as a primer or highlighter. Sometimes I’ll even mix it into body moisturizer or use by itself on shoulders, collar bones, legs

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with warmglow, it is the perfect shade for me! This gel formula is so lightweight and comfortable on the skin, with no sticky residue after application. It delivers a stunning, natural-looking radiance that works beautifully in so many ways. I’ve used it on its own, blended with foundation or moisturizer, and even as a highlighter over makeup. I love the versatility of this super gel, such a great formula!

reviews.review_text: I recently tried the new Saie Glowy Super Gel in Warmglow, and I’m absolutely in love with it! From the first application, it gives my skin a beautiful, natural glow without feeling heavy or sticky. The formula is lightweight and blends effortlessly, leaving behind a soft, dewy finish that looks radiant all day long.  The shade Warmglow is the perfect golden-toned tint that adds warmth to my complexion, making it look like I’ve just come from a sun-kissed vacation. It's versatile too — I can wear it on its own for a fresh, glowing look or mix it with my foundation for an extra boost of radiance.  I am attaching a couple of photos (with flash and without flash) where I'm only wearing this product—no foundation—so you can see the beautiful glow it gives my skin.   Overall, this product has quickly become a staple in my beauty routine, and I highly recommend it for anyone looking to enhance their natural glow!

I can wear it alone, mix it with foundation, or layer it as a subtle highlight. The warm, golden undertones are flattering and add the perfect touch of luminosity without looking glittery. Plus, it feels hydrating and comfortable all day. If you’re after a dewy, effortless glow, this product is a must-try!
